name: Make it look like an accident (Medio_Pelo)
name_original: Make it look like an accident (Medio_Pelo)
description:
Accomplish assigned tasks, eliminating targets and hiding evidence. Help the mafia take control of different cities around the world.
Upgrade and become the most famous and respected gangster on the planet, become the Capo di tutti icapi.

Game Features:
- Multiple gameplay modes
- Fun characters -
Colorful and animated
cities - Variety of cities to unlock
- A beautiful and simple user interface
- Very addictive game mechanics

No matter how many levels you do, in the end you will be judged by which you did not do.
